channel.title: Free trade opportunities
channel.description:
So how is everyone taking advantage of the foreknowledge that free trade and the wilderness will be back on the 1st?
What to stock up on?

item.title: Free trade opportunities
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Dice game can be blackjack aswell. Closest to 13 or 21 (depends who you’re playing with) wins. You can’t go over though or you’ll die/lose.

Read full topic

item.title: Free trade opportunities
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:100, topic:380705”]Someone care to explain the dice game?

But yea I’ve been hosting the flower game, made a mil yesterday.[/quote]

Grab dice
Play 1-100… if they get 51-100 they win. If you get 1-50 you win. They can bet as much as they want. When they bet you let them win just so they will bet more. Change the dice so that it only rolls 1-50 and you win every time

Read full topic

item.description:

But yea I’ve been hosting the flower game, made a mil yesterday.

item.title: Free trade opportunities
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

RuneScape Wiki

Flowers

Flowers are harvested after planting mithril seeds, and grow in many assorted colours with black and white being the rarest. Flowers can be wielded in the Weapon Slot, and are classified as a fun weapon in the Duel Arena. Any type of flower except...

Read full topic

item.title: Free trade opportunities
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Thug-life, post:95, topic:380705”]People take bets on which flower will appear when you plant a mithril seed. Often the planters will offer 5 - 10x the bet amount.

You trade the planter your bet, and then tell them what flower you think will appear - if you get it right, they give you your winnings. Ofc, there are scammers, but there are people who legitimately play the game.[/quote]
And how many types of flowers are able to appear?

Read full topic

item.title: Free trade opportunities
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

I play blackjack with dice, made about 10mil. Kept going back for more!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Free trade opportunities
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

People take bets on which flower will appear when you plant a mithril seed. Often the planters will offer 5 - 10x the bet amount.

You trade the planter your bet, and then tell them what flower you think will appear - if you get it right, they give you your winnings. Ofc, there are scammers, but there are people who legitimately play the game.

Read full topic

item.title: Free trade opportunities
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:93, topic:380705”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=476528.msg3497825#msg3497825 date=1297476773]
just like to point out running or playing the flower game when you have nothing better to do is a great way to make money pick “Red” as it has the highest percentage to grow out of all the solid colors
[/quote]I played this once. The problem is, if you bet high and win, chances that they will give you your winnings is low.[/quote]
What’s the flower game?

Read full topic

item.title: Free trade opportunities
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Many people fool you, specifically mage pures. They take out a scim and some iron or something, and get you to stake. Then in the duel they switch to ancients and freeze you to death. ‘Oh sorry did I forget to mention my magic level was 99? Thanks for the money’

Luckily I make sure I have mage disabled if I ever stake (which was once, and I won 5k woot)

Read full topic

item.title: Free trade opportunities
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

[quote=“Cowie`, post:82, topic:380705”]would have had a lot more if you didnt die wit ha santa.[/quote] that was a tragic day for me. But im sure that rev is happy

Staking on a main and staking on a pure are different. You have to go about them differently. But it’s still possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Free trade opportunities
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:79, topic:380705”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=476528.msg3493325#msg3493325 date=1297098027]

I staked all of my money away. I’m using it as an opportunity to gracefully bow out of the game without any reason to return too soon.

Should toss me your account. I am working a level 4 with 4 mill. It sucks Cant do anything except merch.

get the hati gloves if you are a member spel got them for me and i gained 20 str levels in a few short days.
[/quote]Woah woah woah don’t be leaving out some other people Don’t forget who gave you that shark!

[quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=476528.msg3496033#msg3496033 date=1297312391]

What else is good for flipping now? I have about 12m. I did rune scims for a couple of days but they’re dropping now and are hard to sell. Any other ideas?

strength potions can easily make 50k for every 1k you flip I always flip pking items.
[/quote]How much have you made total?[/quote]
I started with 3m im nearing 11m

Read full topic
